definition: to give up/to abandon/to abort
residence
old variant of 捨|舍[she3]
surname She
to give up/to abandon/to give alms
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: Dantes now left the piece of wood and began to swim to meet it.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼斯现在舍弃了那块破木板，开始向它游去。

sentences.english: Instead of picking dainty pastel florals, try a larger print in darker colors.
sentences.chinese: 舍弃碎花，试试深底色上面大一些的印花。

sentences.english: Even in the realm of cause-and-effect or conditioned origination, the true self always exists in a hidden way, viz.
sentences.chinese: 这表示在舍弃小我之后接下去的就是真我的展现。

sentences.english: When you give up something for something that does not bring immediate joy.
sentences.chinese: 因为你舍弃的东西并没有给你带来半点的欢愉。

sentences.english: Having relinquished all attachment to the five khandhas, the citta is exceedingly refined at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 心已经舍弃了对五蕴的执取，在这个阶段极其精细。

sentences.english: Now if the validation check fails, then the transaction will be aborted.
sentences.chinese: 现在，如果验证检测失败，那么事务将被舍弃。

sentences.english: You know how my mother gave up her own life to care for Ariana.
sentences.chinese: 你知道我母亲为了照顾阿利安娜舍弃了自己的生命。

sentences.english: Cutting off a "minor" part may help to save the colony as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 舍弃“不重要”的部分来保全整个群体。

sentences.english: Here, Machiavelli says, "I depart from the orders of others.
sentences.chinese: 马奇亚维利写到，“我舍弃其它类型的秩序。

sentences.english: Wise ones obtain ultimate joy because they can abandon small pleasures .
sentences.chinese: 智者舍弃小乐，因此他得到了大乐。

sentences.english: Institute of abandoned, you can concentrate and focus in line to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 学会舍弃，你才能心无旁骛，专心一致的求取成功。

sentences.english: Harsh correction is for him who forsakes the way.
sentences.chinese: 舍弃正路的人，必遭受严厉管教。

sentences.english: They forsake everything for the benefit of others.
sentences.chinese: 菩萨为了饶益他人而舍弃一切。

sentences.english: The cruel man abandoned his wife and child.
sentences.chinese: 那个狠心的男人舍弃了妻小。

sentences.english: What emergency things that let persons abnegate their lifes.
sentences.chinese: 是什么事情如此紧急让人们可以舍弃生命呢？

sentences.english: Truncation error results from using only the first few terms of an infinite series.
sentences.chinese: 舍弃误差则因在无穷级数中仅计算及有限项数而造成。

definition: to abandon/to discard/to renounce/to dump (sb)

to sacrifice one's life/to sacrifice (sth valued)/beast slaughtered as a sacrifice
to help sb accomplish his aim/to help sb succeed/to complete/to make whole/to round off

willingly
would rather/better
to lose/to throw away/to discard/to cast away
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
to discard
to let go one's hold/to give up/to have a free hand
to be willing to part with sth
useless/worthless
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
preferably/one would prefer to...(or not to...)/would rather/(would) be better to/(to pick) the lesser of two evils
